description:
Delete vm fails on  Windows Server 2008R2 with the following error:

WindowsError: [Error 145] The directory is not empty: 'C:\\OpenStack\\Instances\\instance-00000003'

This is happening because on Windows 2008R2 it takes a while (1-2 sec. ) for Hyper-V to delete the instance specific files that it stores in the instance folder.
title: HyperV destroy vm fails on Windows Server 2008R2

commit d2735ddb0666381bfbc5fa5f8d4b2157cceeabbb
Author: Adelina Tuvenie <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jun 22 00:48:28 2015 -0700

    Fixes "Hyper-V destroy vm fails on Windows Server 2008R2"
    
    Delete vm fails on Windows Server 2008R2 with the following error:
    [Error 145] The directory is not empty: 'C:\\OpenStack\\Instances\\instance-00000003'
    
    This is happening because on Windows 2008R2 it takes a while (1-2 sec. )
    for Hyper-V to delete the instance specific files that it stores in the
    instance folder.
    
    This patch fixes this bug by adding a retry in the delete method if
    it gets that specific error: WindowsError 145
    
    Closes Bug: 1467409
    Change-Id: I8c194320dfa0c9a00ede3cd5bf38446f896156e3
